alert.note: Alert for Belmont; Coshocton; Guernsey; Harrison; Muskingum; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 5:51PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN HARRISON...NORTHERN GUERNSEY...SOUTHEASTERN COSHOCTON...NORTHERN MUSKINGUM...NORTHWESTERN BELMONT AND SOUTHEASTERN TUSCARAWAS COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM EDT... At 551 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles west of Freeport to Frazeysburg. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Zanesville, Cambridge, Cadiz, Freeport, New Concord, South Zanesville, North Zanesville, Dresden, Frazeysburg, Antrim, Pleasant Grove, and Conesville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Ohio near mile marker 143, and between mile markers 145 and 168. Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 47 and 63. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for east central Ohio.

area.areaDesc: Belmont; Coshocton; Guernsey; Harrison; Muskingum; Tuscarawas
